34 int main( int /*anArgc*/, char** /*anArgv*/ )
35 {
36  // read in xml file
37  KXMLTokenizer tXMLTokenizer;
38  KVariableProcessor tVariableProcessor;
39  KFormulaProcessor tFormulaProcessor;
40  KIncludeProcessor tIncludeProcessor;
41  KLoopProcessor tLoopProcessor;
42  KConditionProcessor tConditionProcessor;
43  KTagProcessor tTagProcessor;
44  KElementProcessor tElementProcessor;
45 
46  tVariableProcessor.InsertAfter( &tXMLTokenizer );
47  tFormulaProcessor.InsertAfter( &tVariableProcessor );
48  tIncludeProcessor.InsertAfter( &tFormulaProcessor );
49  tLoopProcessor.InsertAfter( &tIncludeProcessor );
50  tConditionProcessor.InsertAfter( &tLoopProcessor );
51  tTagProcessor.InsertAfter( &tConditionProcessor );
52  tElementProcessor.InsertAfter( &tTagProcessor );
53 
54  //double tLowEnergy = 1;
55  //double tHighEnergy = 18601;
56  //double tEnergyStepSize = .1;
57  double tLength = 1.0;
58 
59  KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovSpontaneous* tSpontaneus = new KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovSpontaneous();
60  tSpontaneus->SetName("spon");
61  tSpontaneus->SetTag("spon");
62  tSpontaneus->SetTargetPID(10000);
63 
64  KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovIonisation* tIon = new KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovIonisation();
65  tIon->SetName("ion");
66  tIon->SetTag("ion");
67  tIon->SetTargetPID(10000);
68  tIon->SetTemperature(300.);
69 
70  KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovExcitation* tExc = new KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovExcitation();
71  tExc->SetName("exc");
72  tExc->SetTag("exc");
73  tExc->SetTargetPID(10000);
74  tExc->SetTemperature(300.);
75 
76  KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovDeExcitation* tDex = new KSIntDecayCalculatorGlukhovDeExcitation();
77  tDex->SetName("dex");
78  tDex->SetTag("dex");
79  tDex->SetTargetPID(10000);
80  tDex->SetTemperature(300.);
81 
82 
83 
84  KSIntDecay* tDecay = new KSIntDecay();
85  tDecay->SetSplit( false );
86  tDecay->AddCalculator(tSpontaneus);
87  tDecay->AddCalculator(tIon);
88  tDecay->AddCalculator(tExc);
89  tDecay->AddCalculator(tDex);
90 
91  tDecay->Initialize();
92 
93  // initialize root
94  TApplication tApplication( "Test Glukhov", 0, NULL );
95 
96  TCanvas tLifeTimeCanvas( "lifetime_canvas", "lifetime" );
97  TGraph tLifeTimeGraph;
98  TGraph tIonLifeTimeGraph;
99  TGraph tExclLifeTimeGraph;
100  TGraph tDexlLifeTimeGraph;
101  TGraph tSponlLifeTimeGraph;
102 
103 
104 
105  // make particles
106  KSParticle* tInitialParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 10000 );
107  KSParticle* tFinalParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 10000 );
108  //KSParticle* tInteractionParticle = KSParticleFactory::GetInstance().Create( 10000 );
109  KSParticleQueue tSecondaries;
110 
111  tInitialParticle->SetLength( 0.00 );
112  tFinalParticle->SetLength( tLength );
113 
114  KThreeVector tDirection = KThreeVector(0.,0.,1.);
115  int l = 0;
116  int tIndex = 0;
117  for(int n = 10; n < 1000; n++)
118  {
119  tInitialParticle->SetMainQuantumNumber(n);
120  tInitialParticle->SetSecondQuantumNumber(l);
121  tFinalParticle->SetMainQuantumNumber(n);
122  tFinalParticle->SetSecondQuantumNumber(l);
123 
124 
125  double tTotalRate = 0.;
126  double tLifetime = 0.;
127 
128  tIon->CalculateLifeTime(*tInitialParticle,tLifetime);
129  tTotalRate += 1./tLifetime;
130  tIonLifeTimeGraph.SetPoint( tIndex, n, tLifetime);
131  tExc->CalculateLifeTime(*tInitialParticle,tLifetime);
132  tTotalRate += 1./tLifetime;
133  tExclLifeTimeGraph.SetPoint(tIndex,n,tLifetime);
134  tDex->CalculateLifeTime(*tInitialParticle,tLifetime);
135  tTotalRate += 1./tLifetime;
136  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.SetPoint(tIndex,n,tLifetime);
137  tSpontaneus->CalculateLifeTime(*tInitialParticle,tLifetime);
138  tTotalRate += 1./tLifetime;
139  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.SetPoint(tIndex,n,tLifetime);
140  tLifeTimeGraph.SetPoint ( tIndex, n, 1./tTotalRate );
141 
142 
143

178 
179  tLifeTimeCanvas.cd( 0 );
180  tLifeTimeCanvas.SetLogx();
181  tLifeTimeCanvas.SetLogy();
182 
183  tLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerColor( kBlue );
184  tLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
185  tLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
186  tLifeTimeGraph.SetLineWidth( 1);
187  tLifeTimeGraph.SetTitle( "cross section" );
188  tLifeTimeGraph.GetXaxis()->SetTitle( "Energy in eV" );
189  tLifeTimeGraph.GetYaxis()->SetTitle( "cross section in 1/m^2" );
190  tLifeTimeGraph.Draw( "AP" );
191  tLifeTimeGraph.GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(10.,1000.);
192  tLifeTimeGraph.GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(1.e-6,1.);
193 
194  tIonLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerColor( kYellow );
195  tIonLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
196  tIonLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
197  tIonLifeTimeGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
198  tIonLifeTimeGraph.Draw("same");
199  tIonLifeTimeGraph.GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(10.,1000.);
200  tIonLifeTimeGraph.GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(1.e-6,1.);
201 
202  tExclLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerColor( kGreen );
203  tExclLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
204  tExclLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
205  tExclLifeTimeGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
206  tExclLifeTimeGraph.Draw("same");
207  tExclLifeTimeGraph.GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(10.,1000.);
208  tExclLifeTimeGraph.GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(1.e-6,1.);
209 
210  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerColor( kGreen );
211  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
212  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
213  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
214  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.Draw("same");
215  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(10.,1000.);
216  tDexlLifeTimeGraph.GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(1.e-6,1.);
217 
218  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerColor( kYellow );
219  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerStyle( 20 );
220  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.SetMarkerSize( 0.5 );
221  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.SetLineWidth( 1 );
222  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.Draw("same");
223  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.GetXaxis()->SetRangeUser(10.,1000.);
224  tSponlLifeTimeGraph.GetYaxis()->SetRangeUser(1.e-6,1.);
225 
226  tLifeTimeCanvas.Update();
227  tApplication.Run();
228
